title: KOZAF
text:
Kassoum Ouédraogo Zico Académie de Football (or simply KOZAF) is a <a href="Burkina%20Faso">Burkinabé</a> <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> club based in <a href="Ouagadougou">Ouagadougou</a>. The team has played in the <a href="Burkinab%C3%A9%20Premier%20League">Burkinabé Premier League</a>, but was delegated to the <a href="Burkinab%C3%A9%20Deuxi%C3%A8me%20Division">Burkinabé Deuxième Division</a> after the <a href="2020-21%20Burkinab%C3%A9%20Premier%20League">2020-2021 season</a>. They play their home games at the <a href="Stade%20Municipal%20%28Ouagadougou%29">Stade Municipal</a>.
The club was founded by former international footballer <a href="Kassoum%20Ou%C3%A9draogo">Kassoum Ouédraogo</a>.
The club colours are orange and yellow.
